questions.question: The simplest way to make our app do the same (or a similar) task over and over again is to ...

answers.answer: write the same (or similar) statements over and over again in our code
answers.feedback: No, sorry, that's incorrect. We should try to minimise the amount of repeated code we write. Reuse is nearly always better than repetition
Yes, absolutely. By abstracting out the 'similar' parts of the code and repeating these in a loop we can reduce the amount of code we need to write
